meanings.definition: A list of people who have died, especially notable individuals.
meanings.sent1: The necrology in the newspaper listed all the famous people who passed away.
meanings.sent2: The library keeps a necrology to honor important figures who have passed on.
meanings.sent3: The necrology at the memorial service brought tears to everyone's eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her necrology of Hollywood stars was as detailed as a map of the stars.
meanings.sent5: The necrology painted a picture of the lives lost with each name.

meanings.definition: The study or record of deaths and deaths rates in a population.
meanings.sent1: The government uses necrology to understand the health of the community.
meanings.sent2: The necrology report showed an increase in mortality rates in the city.
meanings.sent3: The necrology data was so fascinating that it kept the researchers up all night.
meanings.sent4: In the necrology of the town, each death was like a piece of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The necrology study revealed important trends in the population's well-being.
